                        throws RemoteException

      • createGameLobby

        void createGameLobby(String name,
                     String password,
                     IPlayer host,
                     int maxFloors,
                     int maxPlayers)
              throws RemoteException
        Parameters:
        name - the name of the gamelobby
        password - the password of the gamelobby, can be null
        host - the player that created the gamelobby
        maxFloors - the maximum amount of floors that will be generated.
        maxPlayers - the maximum amount of player that can acces the gamelobby.
        Throws:
        RemoteException

      • exit

        void exit(IPlayer player)
   throws RemoteException
        This method will delete the player from the lobby. So the player can leave the gamelobby.
        Throws:
        RemoteException
